data.title: Kourtney Kardashian Welcomes Baby Boy with Travis Barker
data.meta_description: Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker are parents once again, but this time, it is their first child together.
data.text:
Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker are parents again, but this time, it is their first child together. The Lemme founder, 44, and the Blink-182 drummer, 47, have welcomed their first baby together, sources confirm to People Saturday (November 4). The couple previously revealed that they would be welcoming a little drummer boy via a gender reveal party a few months ago in June. In a new interview, the legendary drummer revealed that their son will be named Rocky Thirteen Barker.

Last month, Kourtney shared a message for critics who say she shouldn’t have a baby at 44 years old. In an interview with Vanity Fair Italia, the Poosh founder brushed off the haters. She told the publication, “Those comments don’t affect me. To those who do them, I just say: how dare you question God’s plan?” That’s how the mother of three sees this pregnancy. She further explained that she and her husband, Travis Barker, stopped thinking about having a baby for a year after they stopped trying with IVF.

RELATED: Kourtney Kardashian Needed Urgent Surgery to Save Unborn Baby

The Kardashians star said the decision to try assisted fertilization was “almost a non-choice, in the sense that I was pushed towards it as if it were the only option.” She felt the process made her feel like she was “doing something that wasn’t right for me. My intuition was telling me that she wasn’t right for me.” She added, “I knew deep down that it wasn’t the right thing. And in fact, I kept telling Travis: if we’re meant to have a baby, then it’s just going to happen. And so it was: when we stopped forcing the process, then it happened.” Kourtney is also a mother to Mason, 13, Penelope, 11, and Reign, 8, whom she shares with ex Scott Disick. Barker is already a father to son Landon, 20, daughter Alabama, 17, and stepdaughter Atiana De La Hoya, 24, with his ex-wife Shanna Moakler.

Laila Abuelhawa is the Top 40 and Hip-Hop pop culture writer for Beasley Media Group. Being with the company for over three years, Laila's fierce and fabulous red-carpet rankings have earned her a feature on 'The Late Show with Stephen Colbert!' Her favorite stories are those surrounding the latest in celebrity fashion, television and film rankings, and how the world reacts to major celebrity news. With a background in journalism, Laila's stories ensure accuracy and offer background information on stars that you wouldn't have otherwise known. She prides herself in covering stories that inform the public about what is currently happening and what is to come in the ever-changing, ever-evolving media landscape.
